planet.name: K2-384 b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Christiansen et al. 2022. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here have been imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
